name: Sokoloseum (Boss Rush Jam 2023)
description:
Made for Boss Rush Jam 2023!

DISCLAIMER : The privacy policy is just for mobile app used to make this game, Yes the game is made within a phone XD

Enjoy a tight sokoban boss rush wih Makeshift elements in terms of graphics and design!

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

The entirety of the game and assets are made in a mobile app called Fancade! So it feels a little more simpler than it could be.

Credits (All are free to use and only found from the Fancade App) :

  • Fanquencer by R3DZ3R
  • Game Music Kit and Fancade Album by James1236
  • Custom Play Once script by Moico24
  • Add Particle by Martin Magni

And last but not least Martin Magni who made the amazing Fancade App which is used to make the entire game. You can check it out at Google Play and App Store and also play.fancade.com !
